channel.title: CVE Feed for Ping Identity -- PingID Windows Login
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ping Identity -- PingID Windows Login

item.title: CVE-2021-41992|2024-08-04T03:22:25.674Z -- ping%20identity -- pingid%20windows%20login
item.description: A misconfiguration of RSA in PingID Windows Login prior to 2.7 is vulnerable to pre-computed dictionary attacks, leading to an offline MFA bypass.
